play.html/language.description: The name of the language you're translating to, in that language.

play.html/about.description.message: Erase All Kittens is a platform game with a difference: the levels are written in HTML and CSS, and the only way to get past them is to use your coding skills to hack the level.
play.html/about.description.description: a short description of the game

play.html/about.instructions.message: Use the <kbd>A</kbd> and <kbd>D</kbd> or <kbd>←</kbd> and <kbd>→</kbd> keys to go left and right. Use <kbd>W</kbd>, <kbd>space</kbd>, or <kbd>↑</kbd> to jump.

play.html/todo.description: for when I've not done stuff yet ;)

play.html/old-browser-msg.title.description: This is the heading for a notice that tells users on older browsers that they can't run the game

play.html/old-browser-msg.html.message: Unfortunately, your browser doesn't support everything we need for you to play Erase All Kittens!. Try installing Firefox.
play.html/old-browser-msg.html.description: Prompt users on old browsers to upgrade to a newer one

play.html/menu.restart.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Puts the level and player back in the starting state.

play.html/menu.edit.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Opens up the edit view.

play.html/menu.save.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Closes the edit view, keeping the code the user entered

play.html/menu.reset.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. When in the edit view, this sets the code to how it was at the start of the level

play.html/menu.cancel.description: Button on the bar at the top of the screen during levels. Closes the edit view, discarding the code the user entered

play.html/menu.undo.description: Undo button for the code editor

play.html/menu.redo.description: Redo button for the code editor

play.html/cutscene.error.message: Oh no! We couldn't load that cutscene...

play.html/loader.b.message: These are some pretty heavy kittens...

play.html/loader.d.message: Are you having a nice day?

play.html/loader.r.message: Time for a cup of tea...

play.html/loader.t.message: Kitten gifs intercepted by the NSA...

play.html/loader.v.message: Haggling over the price of kittens...

play.html/errors.load-sprite.message: Oh no! We couldn't load the animations!

play.html/errors.sound-not-found.message: Oh no! We couldn't load the sound!

play.html/errors.music-not-found.message: Oh no! We couldn't load the music!

play.html/errors.code-errors.message: There are errors in your code! Fix them before saving.

play.html/errors.level-errors.message: There are errors in that level!

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unexpecte.message: Watch out! You've got a closing (end) </{{closeTag.name}}> tag, but no opening (start) tag to go with it.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.mismatche.message: These tags don't match! You've got a closing </{{closeTag.name}}> tag, but it's trying to pair with the opening </{{closeTag.name}}>.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.close-tag.message: DRAMA: <{{closeTag.name}}> tags don't have closing tags, so this </{{closeTag.name}}> isn't needed.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.self-clos.message: OI! You can't have a / at the end of this opening <{{name}}>. It has to go in a closing </{name}}> tag.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unclosed-.message: Oh no! This <{{openTag.name}}> needs a closing </{{openTag.name}}> tag.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.invalid-t.message: There's no such thing as a <{{openTag.name}}> tag. The masters of HTML wouldn't allow it.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.lonely-an.message: This lonely < looks like the start of a tag. It doesn't work on its own - delete it, or add the tag name and closing >.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.untermina.message: You need to add a " at the end of this <{{openTag.name}}> tag's {{attribute.name.value}} attribute. Crazy, right?

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unquoted-.message: You need a " after the = on this {{attribute.name}} attribute. Just saying.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.untermina.message: Whuuutttt!? You need to add a > to this closing </{{closeTag.name}}> tag.
FYI, you need to add a > to the end of this opening </{{closeTag.name}}> tag
This comment should end with a -->.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.invalid-c.message: Hey! There's no such thing as {{cssProperty.property}}. The CSS gods decided it wasn't meant to be. Or perhaps you spelled it wrong...

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.missing-c.message: You need to finish your CSS with a </style> tag!

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unfinishe.message: This selector {{cssSelector.selector}} should end with a {.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.missing-c.message: This {{cssSelector.selector}} is empty! It needs a property.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unfinishe.message: {{cssProperty.property}} isn't finished! You need a : after the property's name.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.missing-c.message: You need to add a value after {{cssProperty.property}}:!

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.unfinishe.message: Oops! Finish your value {{cssValue.value}} with a ;.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.missing-c.message: You need to finish this {{cssSelector.selector}} CSS block with a } after {{cssValue.value}};

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.uncaught-.message: Something's gone terribly wrong. You probably don't know what, and neither do we, but we found this at the scene of the crime: {{error.msg}}.

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.untermina.message: You need to finish this CSS comment with a */! DO IT!

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.html-code.message: EWWWW!!! You've got HTML in your CSS! It doesn't belong there...

data/errors.all.html/slowparse.forbid-JS.message: Sorry! You can't use JavaScript in E.A.K. (yet). So don't. The JavaScript police will get you with their sharp pointy teeth!
